Package net.sf.JRecord.def.IO.builders

This package holds the IOBuilder definitions.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Icb2xmlIOBuilder
    These classes will create Cobol Record Readers/Writers using the supplied COBOL copybook
    Icb2xmlIOProvider
    Interface to create CobolIOBuilders (a Builder builder).
    Icb2xmlLoadOptions
    This interface will not be directly implemented (or probably used by users).
    Icb2xmlMultiFileIOBuilder
    These classes will create Cobol Record Readers/Writers using the supplied cb2xml copybook
    ICobolCopybookIOProvider
    Interface to create CobolIOBuilders (a Builder builder).
    ICobolIOBuilder
    These classes will create Cobol Record Readers/Writers using the supplied COBOL copybook
    ICobolMultiCopybookIOBuilder
    These classes will create Cobol Record Readers/Writers using the supplied COBOL copybook
    ICsvIOBuilder
    This interface is for creating CSV-Readers and writers
    IDefineCsvFields
    Interface for defining Csv field to a IOBuilder
    IDefineFixedFieldsByLength
    Interface for defining Fixed Width files using the Field Length:
    IDefineFixedFieldsByPosition
    This interface defines fixed width files using the position of this field & the next field.
    IFileIOBuilder
    Generic Interface for File (e.g.
    IFixedWidthIOBuilder
    This interface lets you define fixed width files by either there Length or position.
    IIOBuilder
    Basic Interface to define IOBuilders
    IIOCopybookProvider
    Interface to create IOBuilders the use a RecordEditor-Xml file schema
    INewLineCreator
    Class to create an empty Line
    ISchemaIOBuilder
    This interface defines a minimal IOBuilder.

Package net.sf.JRecord.def.IO.builders Description

This package holds the IOBuilder definitions. The IOBuilder's allow you easy access to JRecord's Functionality

   1 
   2     ICobolIOBuilder ioBldr 
   3                 = JRecordInterface1.COBOL
   4                     .newIOBuilder("CobolCopybook.cbl")
   5                         .setSplitCopybook(CopybookLoader.SPLIT_01_LEVEL)
   6                         .setDialect(ICopybookDialects.FMT_FUJITSU);
   7     AbstractLineReader reader = ioBldr.newReader("input File Name");
   8     AbstractLine l;
   9         
  10     while ((l = reader.read()) != null) {
  11         ...
  12     }
  13     reader.close();
  14
